metadata.title: CVE-2023-27372 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
SPIP before 4.2.1 allows Remote Code Execution via form values in thepublic area because serialization is mishandled. The fixed versions are3.2.18, 4.0.10, 4.1.8, and 4.2.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27372` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 4.2.11+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.11+dfsg-1').
